    Big Bang

    By Dylan Jayatilaka June 07, 2014 June 07, 2014 Permalink Like Tweet +1

    And so it begins.

    That place to call home.

    Like the universe, this blog taken some time to get where it is. I made an abortive attempt to do this once before — with Wordpress. It didn’t work because I was’t clear about what I wanted to say. Also, I didn’t like the format, the lack of control over my text.

    So: what is going to be in here, you ask?

    I’m intending this to be mainly technical — about quantum chemistry and crystallography, the computer codes I write to support that work, the text books, journal articles, conferences I go related to those topics. I daresay some teaching material will creep in.

    I’m intending this to be about what I know about: the strange things that anything but banal.

    Welcome.

    Enjoy your stay.
